## inputs.Input.setAlign() method

Change the alignment of the connection's field(s).

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAlign(align: Align): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  align | [Align](./blockly.inputs_namespace.align_enum.md) | One of the values of Align. In RTL mode directions are reversed, and Align.RIGHT aligns to the left. |

**Returns:**

[Input](./blockly.input_class.md)

The input being modified (to allow chaining).
